## Figure 1

```{r}
library(funcgeo)
library(grid)

grid.draw(f)
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(flip(f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(flip(f)))
```

## Figure 2

```{r}
grid.draw(above(f, f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(beside(f, f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(above(beside(f, f), f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(f, angle = 45))
```
